newsitem.title: USA: US late spot heat gains with NYMEX, firmer diffs.
newsitem.headline: US late spot heat gains with NYMEX, firmer diffs.

text.p: U.S. spot refinery products followed NYMEX futures higher Monday, with Gulf Coast distillates stealing the show amid continued refiner buying that swelled differentials across the board, traders said.
USG heating oil was offered at between 0.50 cent and 0.25 cent below March futures late afternoon, about one cent firmer than diffs seen late Friday.
Traders said distillates were helped by the approach of the scheduling deadline for shipping front fourth-cycle heat and low sulfur diesel on the Colonial Pipeline.
